item.title: OpenAI Launches ChatGPT Agent That Can Complete Tasks For You
item.description: OpenAI today launched ChatGPT agent, a new agentic model that is able to think proactively and complete computer-based tasks on the user’s behalf. The ChatGPT agent is in the same family as o3. It com

item.title: ChatGPT’s new AI agent can browse the web and create PowerPoint slideshows
item.description: New “agentic” AI feature combines web browsing with task-execution abilities.

item.title: OpenAI’s new ChatGPT Agent can control an entire computer and do tasks for you

item.title: OpenAI’s New ChatGPT Agent Tries to Do It All
item.description: It’s a PowerPoint generator! It’s a date-night planner! It’s … another agent from OpenAI.

item.title: Another High-Profile OpenAI Researcher Departs for Meta
item.description: Jason Wei, who worked on OpenAI’s o3 and deep research models, will be joining Meta’s superintelligence lab. His colleague Hyung Won Chung is also joining Meta, a source tells WIRED.

item.title: Another High-Profile OpenAI Researcher Departs for Meta
item.description: Jason Wei, who worked on OpenAI’s o3 and deep research models, will be joining Meta’s superintelligence lab. His colleague Hyung Won Chung is also joining Meta, a source tells WIRED.

item.title: Thinking Machines Lab Raises a Record $2 Billion, Announces Cofounders
item.description: Mira Murati and several other former OpenAI researchers are behind the buzzy AI startup, now valued at $12 billion and officially out of stealth.

item.title: Thinking Machines Lab Raises a Record $2 Billion, Announces Cofounders

item.title: AI therapy bots fuel delusions and give dangerous advice, Stanford study finds
item.description: Popular chatbots serve as poor replacements for human therapists, but study authors call for nuance.

item.title: OpenAI’s Windsurf deal is off — and Windsurf’s CEO is going to Google

item.title: Microsoft and OpenAI's AGI Fight Is Bigger Than a Contract
item.description: A key clause in Microsoft and OpenAI’s deal embodies the raging divide between AGI true believers and those who think it’s still a long ways off.
